Question: Dreams are ___ in and of themselves, but, when combined with other data, they can tell us much about the dreamer.
Many fashons that were considered daring in their time have been so widely worn and imitated that the (1) __ style is no longer seen as (2) __.
Choices:
A. proposed
B. original
C. revealing
D. outlandish
E. commonplace
F. Copied
